actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Judiciary.
Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Policy. Forwarded to full Committee with recommendation for indefinite postponement.
Committee on Judiciary. Indefinitely postponed action.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Policy

official_title: A bill for the relief of Samuel S H. Leung, his wife Carol O.K. Leung, and his sons Johnny C.Y. Leung and Jimmy C.M. Leung.

summary.text: Declares four named individuals to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Samuel S H. Leung, his wife Carol O.K. Leung, and his sons Johnny C.Y. Leung and Jimmy C.M. Leung.
